price: Bu dünya hayatı sadece bir eğlenceden, bir oyundan ibarettir. Ahiret yurduna (oradaki hayata) gelince, işte asıl yaşama odur. Keşke bilmiş olsalardı!
arabic: وَمَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَآ إِلَّا لَهۡوٞ وَلَعِبٞۚ وَإِنَّ ٱلدَّارَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ لَهِيَ ٱلۡحَيَوَانُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā hādhihi al-ḥayatu al-dun'yā illā lahwun walaʿibun wa-inna al-dāra al-ākhirata lahiya al-ḥayawānu law kānū yaʿlamūna
